description:
It is revealed that the Mock Arrancar gained an explosive amount of strength when it devoured Yui and has reanimated her soul to use her as bait to lure and attack human souls. While the Mock Arrancar attempts to absorb Shota`s soul, it is met with a counterstrike from Rangiku. Cornered, the Mock Arrancar continues to multiply in order to better its odds against the highly skilled advance troops.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes de Rangiku, le départ douleureux du frère et de la soeur
Rangiku no Namida, Kanashiki Keimai no Wakare
Rangiku`s Tears, the Sorrowful Parting of Brother and Sister
乱菊の涙, 哀しき兄妹の別れ
